projects.name: Summize
projects.description: Simplify your reading with Summize, an open-source article summarizer that transforms lengthy articles into clear concise summaries using using OpenAI's GPT model.

projects.description: A Python-based web application that predicts stock trends using a multi-layer LSTM recurrent neural network.
